description: A pricing strategy where prices of goods or services fluctuate based on supply and demand conditions. 「Dashuju shashu」 (Big data killing familiar customers) refers to discriminatory pricing / personalized pricing.

examples.chinese: 这个动态定价,不一定啥时候便宜
examples.translation: With this dynamic pricing, it's not certain when it will be cheap.

examples.chinese: 买车票机票酒店都可以搞动态定价
examples.translation: Buying train tickets, plane tickets, and hotels can all involve dynamic pricing.

examples.chinese: 动态定价是一种根据市场需求和供应情况实时调整价格的策略
examples.translation: Dynamic pricing is a strategy of adjusting prices in real-time according to market demand and supply.
